headline: Gartner (IT) Valuation Check as New AI Adoption Research Highlights Its Influence on Enterprise and Government Tech Spending
summary: Gartner (IT) is back in the spotlight after releasing fresh research on how AI is transforming workplaces, government IT spending, and B2B purchasing, giving investors a clearer view into its role in the AI economy. See our latest analysis for Gartner. Despite Gartner’s latest AI research keeping it squarely in the conversation, the stock’s momentum has cooled, with a 30 day share price return of minus 5.7% and a three year total shareholder return of minus 32.3%, even though five year total...

headline: AI needs power desperately. Here’s how to invest in companies profiting from the pain.
summary: The shortage is a lucrative opportunity — but the window is brief.
